data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 40 believers in Ragged Island to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ragged Island, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ragged Island to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Ragged Island words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, move the 40 believers in the state of Ragged Island to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Duncan Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Duncan Town, Ragged Island, Bahamas.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ragged Island, Bahamas so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 40 believers living in the state of Ragged Island. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Ragged Island a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
